A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A visually stunning film\, but very lacking in plot and character development. It seems that Rian Johnson\, in his trying to make a non-derivative Star Wars movie\, has done a disservice to the old and new characters in the franchise.

The fans were looking for answers to the myriad of questions that have been asked in The Force Awakens\, but Johnson leaves us with even more questions-nothing is answered.

I saw both The Force Awakens and Rogue One in theatres twice\, I will not be seeing The Last Jedi a second time in theatres.
